course_title: Special Topics In Literature: Ideologies of Theory
class_notes:
(Same as FREN 780 1, PHIL 789 3, CPLT 751 4)
FREN 780 Introduction to Derrida (G. Bennington / Th 1:00-4:00PM in person)
Content:  The class aims to come to a general understanding of some basic Derridean 'concepts' and an appreciation of what we might call some of the manners of deconstruction. Each session will concentrate on one or two texts, but the class as a whole will work cumulatively. Some further readings are suggested, but are not obligatory.
course_description: Various topics, such as theoretical, generic, or cultural studies of literature.
sections: Class Nbr: 5504, Section #: 3, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-4p, Instructor: G. Bennington, Status: Open
